docblock.description: Zm_Domain is a class which allows to manage Zimbra domains via SOAP
docblock.long-description: You may create, modify, rename, delete and get the attributes of a Zimbra domain using this class

docblock.description: Zm_Auth is a class which allows to connect to the Zimbra admin space via SOAP
docblock.long-description:
Use this class to connect and login to a Zimbra server

Example:

$auth = new Zm_Auth($zimbraServer, $zimbraAdminEmail, $zimbraAdminPassword);
$l = $auth->login();
if(is_a($l, "Exception")) {
    echo "Error : cannot login to $zimbraServer\n";
    echo $l->getMessage()."\n";
    exit();
}

docblock.description: Use this method to login to a Zimbra server after you create an instance of this class
